what_you_do: Rev is a platform providing transcription, captions, subtitles, and AI-powered speech-to-text services with a focus on legal transcription accuracy and secure discovery review.
who_you_serve: Attorneys, law enforcement, court reporters, investigators, as well as professionals in research, news, education, healthcare, and video distribution.
social_proof: G2 Leader Winter 2026, #1 platform for legal transcription accuracy, Axon's exclusive speech-to-text partner for over five years, State Bar of Texas first-ever AI partner, HIPAA compliant
signature_programs: SmartDepo, Multi-File Analysis, Rev Mobile App, Rev AI Notetaker
business_focus: Providing accurate transcription, captioning, and AI-powered speech-to-text services primarily for legal professionals and law enforcement.
service_provided: Human transcription, AI transcription, human captions, AI captions, court reporting, global subtitles, AI notetaker, multi-file analysis, SmartDepo deposition summaries
